【Remove Odor】: Guinea pig disposable cage liner contains activated carbon, which can effectively remove and neutralize the smell of urine. When the pet during toilet training, say goodbye to the unpleasant odor! Keep your home clean air.
【Strong Absorption】: The water-absorbent layer in bunny cage liner can accelerate the liquid to pass through the surface, and the liquid will be in contact with it to form a gel, which instantly locks moisture and keeps the surface dry and comfortable. Let pets develop a habit of loving cleanliness.
【Anti-Leakage】: The PE film layer at the bottom of the training pads is widened around to prevent the pet’s urine from leaking out, prevent soiling the floor and your furniture. It can be used not only indoors but also outdoors (used when traveling or playing leisurely on the lawn).
【Training Pad Size】: 100 count bunny pee pads size is 13″ x 18″ (33 x 45cm), replace the pad at a time, bid farewell to tedious cleaning work. Suitable for rabbits, guinea pigs, chinchillas, puppies, dogs, cats and other small pets.

if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

From the brand

We understand pets are like family and have worked hard to developed products for both you and them to enjoy. Our collections have wide variety of designs and sizes in order to suit your pets needs and fit into any home style. We’ve curated thoughtful products that are both functional for your pet and timeless in design. You will be able find everything you need to help your furry friend feel right at home.

Shop Storage Bins

Shop Ceramic Food Bowls

Shop Food Mats

More to love from Bone Dry!

Polyester Polyamide Microfiber
PERFECT TOWEL TO DRY SMALL, MEDIUM, AND LARGE DOGS AND CATS: Bone Dry Pet Towel measures 41×23.5″ and is great for drying dogs and cats of different breeds and sizes
MATERIAL AND CARE: Towel is made of ultrasoft microfiber, machine washable, and super absorbent, making drying your pet easy; For best long lasting results, do not use fabric softener
LIGHTWEIGHT DURABLE AND EASY TO CARRY: This towel can be stored in your car for on the go trips for your pet or at home; Provides comfort for your pet and protection for your couch, carpet, car, bed, floor, or chair
KEEP YOU PET WARM AND COZY: Great for grooming, traveling, a pet kennel, or cage to keep your pet warm, cozy and comfortable
MORE BONE DRY PET PRODUCTS: Bone Dry is a highly trusted brand for pet accessories; Click Bone Dry above to view more of our products


Pet Towels

DII Bone Dry microfiber dog bath towels with embroidered paw print or bone are durable, absorbent, and fast drying. These microfiber dog bath towels are long lasting and machine washable. Quickly dry off your pet after bath time with DII super absorbent pet towels.

Lightweight and easy to care for, this towel can be stored in your car for on the go trips for your pet or at home.

Great for grooming, traveling, in a kennel, or cage to keep your pet warm, cozy and comfortable.

Visit Our Brand Page

To view more of DII’s pet products visit our official site for our entire selection.

  • Wicker Pet Baskets – Three Sizes!
  • Pet Storage Bin-Three Sizes in Various designs
  • Non-Skid Pet Food Bowl- Three Sizes with Various designs
  • Pet Bath Towels
  • Pet Blankets
  • Pet Bed-Machine Washable!
  • Cage Liner and Under Cage Mat

Read more

DII Bone Dry Pet Products





Wicker Pet Basket

DII wicker pet toys and accessories storage or home décor bone shape basket comes in three sizes: 18 inch long by 7.5 inch tall, 21 inch long by 78 inch tall, and 24 inch long by 9 inch tall These wonderful baskets easily clean with a damp wet cloth or sponge. DII wicker baskets are dark espresso in color with a modern look making this a great décor piece for your home. The lid securely latches to keep your pet from opening, so no more sneaking treats! The convenient handle makes it easy to transport or move when needed. DII wicker pet baskets are perfect for holding dog treats, leashes, toys, blankets and more!

Pet Bed

DII Bone Dry Ultra Plush Padded Pet Bed is perfect for your dog or cat. Elevated sides block drafts and also give your pets a place to rest their head on. Available in various sizes to fit a variety of breeds. Made of durable Oxford fabric and filled with premium polyester fiber for added support. Our Ultra Plush Padded Pet Bed is machine washable and cushion is removable making cleaning super easy. Give your pet the perfect place to cuddle while adding stylish décor to your home with DII Bone Dry Ultra Plush Padded Pet Bed.

Ultra-Absorbent Microfiber Pet Mat

Bone Dry Microfiber Pet Mat provides your pet with their own dining area to minimize mess. It absorbs spills and keeps their eating area nice and dry. This pet placemat is made of super absorbent microfiber and immediately absorbs any slop, splash or spill. A great piece for your pet’s kennel or cage – maximum absorbency ensures that your pet is not lying in spilled water while you are away. Protect your carpets and hardwoods from water spills or food stains with DII’s absorbent pet mat.

Cuddly Pet Blankets

DII Bone Dry absorbent microfiber pet blankets come in an assortment of colors and excellent for travel or nap time for your adorable pet. DII offers wonderfully made absorbent microfiber pet blankets that features a cute and adorable bone shape design and are heavenly soft to touch. These pet blankets are perfect for your pet to lie on while in a car, crate, and kennel to keep your pet warm, cozy, and dry.

Read more





Microfiber Plush Mop Mitt Towel

The best towel for drying your pet. Each side is sew together allowing for pockets for your hands. These pockets give you the ability to quickly run the towel up and down your pet and dry quickly. Microfiber Chenille will quickly grab dirt and water off of your pet, 10 times more absorbent than cotton. Because of this, your towel is picking up more moisture on your pet. Your pets will dry faster, making bath time a lot easier.

Non-Skid Ceramic Pet Bowl

DII Bone Dry Non-Skid Ceramic Pet Bowl is perfect for your dog or cat – suitable for food and water and available in various designs and sizes. The bowl is conveniently dishwasher safe so it can be easily cleaned. The silicone rim at the bottom will keep your pet’s bowl from sliding around on the floor, which means no more messy floors for you to clean. Delight your hungry pup with this ceramic bowl in a fun print with a stay-put silicone bottom.

Pet Storage Bin

DII pet toys and accessories rectangle storage basket comes in three sizes. The neutral colors and subtle texture of these baskets makes them great décor pieces for your home. The storage basket stands upright and the convenient handles make it easy to transport or move when needed. DII pet toys and accessories round storage baskets are perfect for holding dry dog treats, leashes, collars, toys, blankets, outfits, grooming supplies, and more!

Bone Dry Pet Toy

Bone Dry loves pets! Our Pet Toy collections are great way to bond with your furry pal. Buy one or a pair today to make tails wag and dog owners smile. Our squeaky dog toys provide comfort and satisfies your dog’s natural urge to chew. With so many characters to choose from in different toy styles our DII Bone Dry toys are great for hours of fun. Perfect for your pooch to entertain themselves or a bonding experience with you and your pet.

GREAT CHOICE FOR YOUR PETS – IMMCUTE Pet Training and Puppy PadsA clean and fresh-smelling home that every pet parent and dog deserves. IMMCUTE pet training pads are ideal for puppies and dogs that stay indoors for long periods of time.All-day ProtectionIt can provide all-day protection for the puppy or senior dog potty training, making your cleanup a breeze and saving you much time.Made of High-quality Materials

  • Non-woven Fabrics
  • Tissue Paper
  • Super Absorbent Polymer (SAP)
  • Fluff Pulp
  • Tissue Paper
  • Waterproof Polyethylene (PE Film)

IMMCUTE dog pee pads are made of high-quality materials, more durable than most pet training pads on the market.6-layer ProtectionThe 6-layer protection technology makes it super absorbent and leak-proof to protect your floors or carpets by preventing leaks. And the absorbent polymer layer instantly turns liquid into a gel, preventing tracking, liquid overflow, and bad smell.Multiple UsesThe puppy pads usually placed in pet crates or kennels, pet pad holders, paper boxes, or put under the dog bowl or on the car backseat to keep clean.Not Only for Dogs, But Also for Other PetsOur pee pads/potty pads are oriented to a wide range of animals, not just for dogs but also for other pets, like kittens, cats, rabbits, ducks, guinea pigs, squirrels, etc.Note:

  • Please measure and determine the size you need before purchasing.
  • Please allow 0-0.4″ error due to manual measurement.
  • Always remember to dispose of soiled dog potty pads and replace them as needed.

【SUPER ABSORBENT & THICKER】Thickened wee wee pads for dogs and 6-layer protection design makes our XL dog pee pee pads more absorbent than the most puppy potty pads on the market.
【QUICK-DRYING】Unique flash-dry technology quickly turns liquid into gel, preventing tracking, liquid overflow, and bad smell.
【LEAK-PROOF】Each pet training pad features a plastic backing and border to protect your floors or carpets by blocking leaks for 24 hours.
【ALL DAY PROTECTION】Our puppy pads pet training pads are a great solution for multi-dog homes and pets that need to stay inside for a long period of time.
【XLARGE SIZE】28″ W x 34″ L(71.1cm x 86.4cm).Our magic pee pads are perfect for puppies, senior or sick dogs, kittens, cats, rabbits, ducks and other pets. Not only for your indoor use but also for outdoor use (especially use during travel or the leisure time on the lawn).

Product Description

GAGURL reusable pet pads made of 4 Layers material with silicone non-slip bottom, has strong absorption to liquid, could well to against the heaviest smell. It could well protect your pets from slide or pad movement. Ideal for training, playpen, cat litter box, crate, ultimate protection for floor, carpet, bed, furniture, sofa, car seat. Our durable pet pad can be reused while saving money.We at GAGURL spend countless hours in developing, sourcing, and testing our products. Our primary concerns are that everything we make is safe for pets and their owners, a quality item, and has great value.

4- LAYER DESIGN

1 layer:100% polyester knitting surfac.

2 layer: Thickened super absorbent cotton.

3 layer: Breathable waterproof PUL inner layer; 100% polyester knitting fabric.

4 layer: Non-Slip silica gel bottom.

EFFICIENT ABSORPTION

The washable reusable pee pads are super absorption and non-leak, better to keep your pet and house clean. Ensure your indoor and outdoor furniture is protected against doggie wee accidents, floor water spills, and damage to your precious items.

LASTEST DESIGN

Our washable pee pads have cute patterns. Dogs and dog parents alike will love these designs.And 4 hole help you stick our pee pad on any flat surface so your dog never misses its mark.

COST-EFFICIENT: Our reusable pee pads for dogs ensure that fluids are absorbed and held for laundering without leaking. Washable and reusable puppy pads save you money and are good for our planet, our reusable puppy pee pads are good for 100+ washing cycles. Our pet pads are more cost-effective, of higher quality, and have a lower environmental impact than disposable pads that you constantly have to rebuy.
Durable & Comfortable: Our training pads are made of breathable waterproof PUL and a high-density inner layer which let the absorbency great and does not leak. 4 layers structure durable & comfortable, the first layer is a soft quilted fabric layer, the second layer is the absorbent layer, which can absorb 1000-1500ml of liquid, the third layer is the leak-proof layer, and the bottom layer is the anti-slip layer. Perfect for cars, sofas, beds, furniture, crates, and pet gate.
MULTI-USE: This reusable dog pad can be used for dog playpens, kennels, under food and water bowls, and cat litter boxes. It is helpful to protect our floors, sofas, and furniture away from damaged. Also can be used for car and RV travel, protecting car seats and car trunks. Our pads for dogs are perfect for pups of all ages. Use the pet pads to train puppies, and help senior or sick dogs use the bathroom in the right place.
What You Will Get: One package comes with 2 pack of reusable dog pee pads and 4 suction cup hook. 2 pack are really convenient for the busy pet owner, when the first get dirty, there is another one that can be changed, and that’s very convenient, your pets do not need to wait for the dirty one to wash and dry, and 2 pack keeps your house clean and your pet comfortable. We offer a 1-year guarantee, any problem, please feel free to contact us.
Reusable Puppy Pads: The washable pee pads for dogs are gray and have cute patterns on them, the reusable pee pads for dogs which is soft and comfortable could also provide funny for the puppy in travel. These waterproof reusable pee pads for dogs are a stylish choice! There are multi sizes to choose from, please choose a suitable size before placing an order. If you have any questions about the washable dog pee pads, please feel free to contact us.

Product Description

IMMCUTE Dog Pee Pads

IMMCUTE is committed to providing customers with high-quality and highly absorbent pet training pads. Our pet pee pads/potty pads are suitable for dogs, cats, rabbits, ducks, guinea pigs, etc. Multiple sizes are available. Keep your house clean and air-fresh, just choose IMMCUTE dog pads.

Pet Training Pads

Pet’s perfect life starts with using them!

IMMCUTE Pet Pads give your dogs the best chance for successful potty training. Our pet training pads offer superior performance and reliable convenience so that your puppy learns fast and always knows where to relieve himself correctly.

In addition to training young puppies, our pads also work well for assisting sick or aging dogs, making dogs live more comfortable and happy.

FEATURES:

6-layer Protection Tear-resistance Fast Absorbent Leak-proof Thicken Pads Multi-sizes Available

Why Choose IMMCUTE Puppy Training Pads

6-layer Protection

IMMCUTE puppy pads are engineered with 6 layers of leak-proof protection. Especially, the pee pad features a plastic backing and border to protect your floors or carpets by blocking leaks.

Super Absorbent

IMMCUTE premium dog pads are super absorbent and long-lasting. It can trap more pet urine for repeat use or multiple usages. However, we recommend that you change the pad in time.

Quick Drying

IMMCUTE’s unique flash-dry technology instantly turns liquid into gel, absorbs liquid fast to prevent tracking, leaking, and bad smell.

Leak-proof Design

IMMCUTE dog training pad features a plastic backing and border to protect your floors or carpets by blocking leaks. The plastic backing (PE film) is also tear-resistant.

IMMCUTE Dog Training Pads Have Multiple Usages

Pad for Crate & Kennel

Put the dog pad into the pet’s crate or kennel for added comfort or do some assistance for potty training while making cleanup so easy for you.

Dog Pads for Travel

IMMCUTE Pet Pads will come in handy when you bring your pet going out or for travel. Line the backseat of your vehicle with dog pee pad, it not only keeps your car clean but also prevents mess.

Placement under Food & Water Bowl

Place the pad under your pet’s food and water bowl for mess prevention. Also, it protects your floors effectively and is convenient to cleanup.

Placement under Cat Litter Box

Place the pet pad under your cat’s litter box for easy cleanup and protecting your floors effectively.

Pad Size (in Inches)
22 x 23 22 x 23 22 x 23 28 x 30 28 x 34

Hours of Protection
24 Hrs. 24 Hrs. 24 Hrs. Up to 30 Hrs. Up to 36 Hrs.

【QUICK-DRYING】Unique flash-dry technology quickly turns liquid into gel, preventing tracking, liquid overflow, and bad smell.
【LEAK-PROOF】Each pet training pad features a plastic backing and border to protect your floors or carpets by blocking leaks.
【ALL DAY PROTECTION】Our puppy pads pet training pads are a great solution for multi-dog homes and pets that need to stay inside for a long period of time.
【PRODUCT SIZE】22″W x 23″L(56cm x 58cm).Our doggy pads are perfect for puppies, senior or sick dogs, kittens, cats, rabbits, ducks and other pets. Not only for your indoor use but also for outdoor use (especially use during travel or the leisure time on the lawn).

Why choose our whelping pad?
Washable pee pads can be used for 300 of times
Anti slip rubber backing has won the love of the puppy,we say “stay”,it stay in the place
Can be cut, edges won’t unravel, easy to fit any whelping box,playpen,dog fences indoor,crate,kennel

Available sizes of waterproof puppy pads
36×41, 36×48, 54 x 54, 65 x 48, 72 x 72 inch

Package
1 pad in each package not including cage

4-layer waterproof mat for dogs
Fast absorbent material polar fleece for 1st layer keeps our puppy dry all the day
We can have fun with our pet on the bed or couch,don’t worry about the urine through to
puppy pads thanks to the 2nd layer use the highest quality waterproof material PU
Our whelping mat are sturdy enough to withstand the chewing of the puppies
Rubber dot used in 4th layer keep the pee pad precise stays in the place, no matter how naughty our puppies keeps crawling.

How to train our dog?
Usually, our dog is about to pee, he will starts to sniff around, now quickly guide it to the pad,
show our anger if pee on the floor, and clean without leaving a smell ;On the contrary,
give it a reward, such as feeding something and praising “good boy”, if the urine is properly on the pad.
Repeatedly, puppy will have a good habit of using a pad.

Service
We will feedback in 24 hours
HIGH SOAKING &LIVE SAVER–Quick absorbent and hold 8 cups( 68 oz ) of liquid ; top layer light grey colour covers any stains that might be on the pee pads ,no leak through or smell,prevents tracking,keep puppies dry all the night
NON-SLIP&EASY TO WASH -Upgraded non slip rubber backing maximizes doggy potty pads stay on bed or floor, puppies crawl more easier; just throw into the washer wash warm and tumble dry in low heat or hang dry, sanitary, stain free and good as new
DURABLE&ECO-FRIENDLY- Washable and reusable 300 of times,a must for any kind of housebreaking school for puppies and kittens; an excellent economic and environmental, beats buying endless bags of disposable pads
MULTI-USE-Extra large dog pads 72″ x 72″ perfect for whelping box 5′x 5′ & training puppies pee in dog playpen or assisting incontinence elderly dogs,great protection for bed,sofa, furniture,floor,carpet,car seat; ultra waterproof also be used as a floor protectors underneath the water bowl
NO MESS-After puppies potty training through pet pee pads ,we will feel relieved leaving doggie alone at home while us work.Even for 24 hours, floor still remain clean up.We just sell whelping pad not including cage

SIZE AND COLOR● Comes in a pack of 2● Available in brown and grey shades to choose from ● Aptly measured to size 24″ ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $21.99 - $16.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:50:41 UTC – Details)


One of the most essential items in dog accessories and for all those Pet parents who want to give a relaxing bath experience to their furballs.

SIZE AND COLOR
● Comes in a pack of 2
● Available in brown and grey shades to choose from
● Aptly measured to size 24″ wide x 40″ long for easy drying without stressing hands
● Our dog bath towel size is a perfect fit for small to medium-sized animals

EXCELLENT QUALITY
● Crafted with the perfect blend of 80% polyester and 20% polyamide for ultimate softness and coziness
● Highly durable and does not fade or deform after multiple washes
● Super absorbent, soak water quickly and keep your dog calm and relaxed
● Lightweight, easy on hands
● Fur-friendly material helps in quick drying without leaving a “wet doggy” odor

DUAL POCKETS
● Our durable dog towel comes with 2 triangular 7″ x 7.21″ pockets for strong grip to dry your dog’s underbelly and legs
● Its soft and durable microfiber material gently massage and give natural skin warmth to your pooch

MULTI-PURPOSE
● Our fine quality drying towels for dogs is ideal to wick out moisture from your pets after bath, swimming or shower
● Can be used in your pets crate to keep them cozy and warm

EASY TO WASH
● Can be launder easily in machine using cold water and mild soap
● Tumble dry on low temperature and gentle cycles
● Do not use bleach
● Do not iron
● Keep away from fire

PRODUCT SPECIFICATION
● Package Includes: 2 Dog drying towel
● Package Weight: 14.07 oz
● Package Size: 12.71 x 10.91 x 2.76 inches
● Product size: 24″ wide and 40″ long
● Color: Grey and Brown
● Material: 80% polyester and 20% polyamide
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 12.71 x 10.91 x 2.76 inches; 14.07 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 8, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ PAWPUP
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B094GDZN3V

Pet Friendly Material – Made with 80% polyester and 20% polyamide, our personalized dog towels blends softness and durability for an ideal bath experience for your dog; Extremely absorbent and large enough to make drying quicker and easier
Dual Pockets – Unlike others, our microfibre dog drying towel has 2 pockets for easy grip; Soft, sturdy and gives natural skin warmth to calm your pet
Multitude Usage – Either use it as a pet towel or make it an ideal comfort item for your pet’s kennel to keep them warm and cozy; It’s super soft and glides smoothly on the wet skin to help your furry friends dry quickly
Easy to Wash – Our easy to clean dog towels for drying dogs can be conveniently washed in machine using mild detergents to always keep it clean and ready for your dog’s next grooming session; Tumble dry on gentle cycle

Product Description

Where the doormat will be uesd?

If it’s going to be used in an outdoor area, it’s important to pick a mat made from weather-resistant materials such as teak, woven seagrass or waterproof coconut fibers, which are highly durable and ideal for busy indoor-outdoor areas.

This new model mat is built with 4 drainage channels to help drain excess water in rainy and snowy days.

We highly recommend that you use this doormat, it will offer you a surprsie!

Amazing value 2-Pack,own two indoor outdoor doormats at once,perfect welcome for the everyday home

The natural nitrile rubber non slip backing prevents moisture leaking and keeps mat in place

The front door mat will not collapse for a long time, effectively capture scrap dirt and mud

Use Anywhere

𝐍𝐨𝐧-𝐬𝐥𝐢𝐩&𝐅𝐫𝐨𝐬𝐭-𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐭：The outdoor mats for home entrance with rubber backing uses 100% natural nitrile rubber (not cheaper PVC or glue) to keep mats flexible AT LOW TEMPERATURE OF −40°F, AVOIDING FROZEN
𝐖𝐢𝐝𝐞 𝐑𝐚𝐧𝐠𝐞 𝐨𝐟 𝐀𝐩𝐩𝐥𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬: These Versatile Mats can be used for RV, the garage, laundry rooms, indoors and outdoors, the matts will do the job of preventing all that sand, leaves, dirt and mud from traveling inside.
𝐄𝐚𝐬𝐲 𝐂𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐧 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐌𝐚𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐚𝐢𝐧: You can sweep the mat with a broom, rinse under cold water or vacuum regularly, shake off outdoors or over your garbage bin. Then, hang it in a ventilated place after cleaning, it can be air dry in one day.
𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐌𝐨𝐬𝐭 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐦𝐨𝐧 𝐒𝐢𝐳𝐞: At 29.5 x 17.5IN in size, these floor mat for house can be ideally used in many locations, for some special locations it will be smaller, but for most locations like front door, back door, washing machine, pets area it will be the perfect mat. We are the factory so we know that this size is the size with the largest order quantity every year.
𝐒𝐨𝐦𝐞 𝐓𝐢𝐩𝐬 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐘𝐨𝐮: The package is rolled up shipping but it still can lay completely flat immediately. When you receive your door mat, please air the pair outside for some hours, we are afraid that some mats will be with odor, thanks for your patience.
